HOME.universeText: A new concept of fashion, interpreted through the exclusivity of our models. Each new collection represents an aesthetic journey through winding lines, heels, colors and exclusive materials. The Lapista shoe is not just an accessory to wear, but a manifestation of feelings that need to be seen and touched.
HOME.universeTextBold: A special woman needs a special shoe. Become a part of our world.
HOME.ourWorldHeading: BECOME A PART OF OUR WORLD.
HOME.ourWorld: Luxuriously handmade creations, proudly made in Italy, ready to give your clothes a touch of glamor, making your style unique.

ABOUT.ourTarget: Our goal is to turn the desires hidden in every woman’s heart into reality, and that is what makes each of our shoes a unique stylistic experience. Since 2010, this passion has become the leitmotif of the Italian company IDENTITÀ, making a sincere and passionate contribution to the world of fashion. The ideal and artistic avant-garde does not give up the traditional hand-made production where each individual finish is exclusively hand-stitched.
ABOUT.ourTarget2: An obsessive search for materials, precise and accurate choice of models make this company unique in the world market. Fascinated by the quality and models, which are of the rank of large fashion houses, we decided to present the IDENTITÀ brand in Serbia as well.
ABOUT.ourObject: In our retail facility "LA PISTA" in Djordja Stanojevica 11d store 3 (building Lilac) BELLVILE, Belgrade or order online. Packages prepared with the utmost care, certificate of authenticity, mark of origin of material, dust bag and box, we send within 24 hours in Serbia.

CONTACT.writeUsText: Our goal is to respond within 24 hours, however, during busy periods such as holidays, sales and special campaigns, it may take a little longer.
CONTACT.fillForm: Simply fill out the form and click on ‘submit’ to submit your inquiry
